description: This file defines the GradientHeader widget, a custom StatelessWidget for Flutter that provides a styled header with a gradient background, title text, and optional trailing widget.

classes.name: GradientHeader
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a header with gradient background, a title, and optional trailing widget.

methods.name: GradientHeader
methods.description: Constructor for the GradientHeader widget, requiring a title and allowing optional trailing widget and padding.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget by creating a container with gradient decoration, containing a row with the title and optional trailing widget.
